Params[3]: Commandant Dormitory, Babylonia. 11:20 am. One hour away from the date with Bianca.

Params[2]: I should be there on time. Let's arrive 10 minutes early.
Params[4]: Can't keep a date waiting! I'm arriving half an hour early!

Params[3]: (50 minutes later.)
(30 minutes later.)
The air feels fresh after a brief morning rain. A scatter of people walks by the road, and you notice the tall female figure by a lamp post from afar.

Params[4]: Why are you here so early?

Params[3]: Bianca turns around. She is still equipped with her usual frame, but she looks different than usual somehow.
Commandant...
I happen to be free today, so I arrived a little early.
The temperature is still a little cold. Based on what you usually wear, you might be a bit underdressed.
It's getting windy at night. Here, please put on this scarf in case you catch a cold...

Params[4]: That's very sweet of you, Bianca...

Params[3]: It's what I should do.
Let's go. We're heading that way.
Bianca walks toward a lawn by the side and takes out a blanket from her bag, laying it over the damp grass.
You haven't had your lunch yet, right, Commandant?

Params[4]: Now that you've mentioned it, I'm getting a little hungry.

Params[3]: Bianca sits on the blanket and opens the package she is carrying, revealing a series of lunchboxes filled with sizzling hot meals.
I wasn't sure what you liked, so I made one of every cuisine I was good at.

Params[4]: Did you make all of this, Bianca?!

Params[3]: (Nods)
My previous... job involved taking care of other people.
This is nothing out of the ordinary.

Params[4]: Thank you! They look super delicious!

Params[3]: There's tea for digestion in this cup. Please enjoy.

Params[4]: It's so rare to see you smiling, Bianca.

Params[3]: ...Did I?
I guess that's because this reminds me of the past.
It has been a long time since someone said something like this to me...
For some reason, it's oddly comforting.

Params[2]: It comforts you making food for other people?
Params[4]: Then please keep making food for me in the future!

Params[3]: I-it's just... taking care of others has jogged some old memories.
But if that's what you want, Commandant...
I'm more than happy to comply.
